quote: Engage in those actions and thoughts that nurture the good qualities you want to have. – Paramahansa Yogananda
fact: Statues in parks: If the horse has both front legs in the air, the person died in battle; if the horse has one front leg in the air, the person died as a result of wounds received in battle; if the horse has all four legs on the ground, the person died of natural causes.
joke: A man walked in to a bar with some asphalt on his arm. He said “Two beers please, one for me and one for the road.”
